Package edu.du.penrose.systems.util

General purpose utilities.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EscapeCharacters  
FileUtil Sone generic file naming utilities.
FileUtil.Batch_fileFilter Filter to find 'batch_' files, will match yyyy(batch_)XXXX.xml it centralCity_batch_ingest.xml or centralCity_batch_overlay.xml and without the remote file suffix
FileUtil.Remote_Batch_fileFilter Filter to find 'batch_' files, will match yyyy(batch_)XXXX_REMOTE.(xml or zip) ie centralCity_batch_ingest_bagit.zip or centralCity_batch_overlay.xml
FileUtil.XML_fileFilter  
FileUtil.XML_NON_remote_fileFilter look for an xml file WITHOUT 'remote_' marker showing that it was created by a remote ingest.
FileUtil.XML_or_ZIP_NON_remote_fileFilter File ends with zip or xml and does NOT HAVE remote task suffix
FileUtil.XML_or_ZIP_remote_fileFilter File ends with zip or xml and has remote task suffix
FileUtil.XML_remote_fileFilter look for an xml file with a 'remote_' marker showing that it was created by a remote ingest.
FileUtil.ZIP_fileFilter File ends with zip
HttpClientUtils  
JmsUtils  
MyServletContextListener  
MyServletContextListenerOLD  
SendMail  
XSLTransformerDUextension This is a copy of org.jdom.transform.XSLTransformer, with the exception of the new constructor allowing you too specify the XSLT processor.
Zipper Some utilities for compression and uncompression
